scripts.dev: npm run installDeps && npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n stack,fe_build 'npm run util:docker-compose-up' 'npm run feBuildAndWatch'
scripts.frontend:build: cd frontend && docker build . --file Dockerfile-builder --tag frontend_builder && docker run -u $(id -u ${USER}):$(id -g ${USER}) -w='/app' --volume=$(pwd):/app --rm frontend_builder
scripts.tests: npm run installDeps && npm run beMigrations && npx  concurrently 'npm run feUnitTests' 'npm run beUnitTests && npm run beFunctionalTests'
scripts.installDeps: npx concurrently --kill-others-on-fail 'cd backend && composer install -q --prefer-dist' 'cd frontend && npm i -q --no-audit'
scripts.feUnitTests: echo 'TO BE IMPLEMENTED' && exit 0; cd frontend && npm run test:cli
scripts.beSeedDB: ECR_PREFIX=216987438199.dkr.ecr.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/finance TAG=latest docker-compose run --rm backend php yii fixture/load "*",
